tool_description: Analyzes all verification data using machine learning models to detect potential identity fraud patterns and synthetic identities.

applicant_data.description: JSON string containing all collected applicant verification data

fraud_model_version.description: Fraud detection model version to use

error_messages: Invalid applicant data format: Provide verification data as a valid JSON string.
Insufficient data for analysis: More verification data points needed for reliable fraud detection.
Model version not found: Specify a valid fraud detection model version or use 'latest'.
Invalid sensitivity level: Use one of [low, medium, high].
usage: Submit all collected verification data as a JSON string. Optionally specify fraud model version and sensitivity level for detection.

fraud_risk_score.description: Fraud risk score from 0-100 (higher means more risk)

fraud_indicators.description: List of specific fraud indicators detected

risk_category.description: Risk category: low_risk, medium_risk, high_risk, extremely_high_risk

recommendation.description: Recommended action based on fraud analysis
